example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC يوم) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS جاءت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN_PROP فرنسا)))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1S هيأت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_3FS ها))) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC زيارة)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN متحف) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العلوم) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكبريتية)))
